title: Role of women parliamentarians in budget, legislation lauded
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 24 (APP): The women parliamentarians of Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Thursday and discussed various matters of importance.
The meeting was attended by Members of National Assembly Alia Hamza, Saira Bano and Nuzhat Pathan. PMâ€™s Special Assistant for Political Affairs Malik Amir Dogar was present.
The meeting highlighted the positive role played by the women parliamentarians in matters relating to budget and legislation.
